content: I love this games, they are nice and quick yet thinky, however, the brown track stop working randomly during the game and that frustrates me no end, hope it will get fixed soon!

Great game. There seems to be a bug though. When I select a +1 in the passive phase it only lets me fill in the third row for a yellow die. I thought you could only choose gray spots for yellow but even with the number changer it would only let me put a number in the third row. Definitely was not in the third roll either. I was in the passive phase.... There is a reply to this review and I am aware of that rule. It was letting me fill in ANY box in the third row, not just the gray squares.
replyContent: Hi Antonio, in yellow you can only check the gray squares in the passiv move (not I / II / II). Its the right implementation double check the rules. Many thanks for the good rating and I hope you enjoy a lot of games

content: Better the the two prequals!! Favorite roll and write to date!!
Stats tracking now working, but can't get email to send to link to android tablet. Linked account already to email on phone (That email worked).
A great implementation of the third installment of the Clever series. Achievements unlock properly, but the app is not tracking my scores in the "statistics" section.
Great game. Ok app. Achievements are still buggy and not tracked propetly (as the previous games)
